formal_name:
LEGO® Pirates of the

description:
Shiver me timbers! Disney Interactive Studios and TT Games invite you to hoist yer flag and raise anchor for a high seas adventure - as LEGO® Pirates of the Caribbean The Video Game comes to Nintendo 3DS. Bringing all the swashbuckling action of the Pirates of the Caribbean movies alive in LEGO form, this thrilling new take on the series is sure to excite and delight with plenty of skullduggery and swordplay! Savvy?

If all of this has made you believe that it’s a pirate’s life for ye, then set sail with no delay for LEGO Pirates of the Caribbean The Video Game on Nintendo 3DS.

* Featuring 70 characters and famed locations from the movie series. * Exploration, combat and puzzles await you in over 20 action-packed levels. * There’s hours of fun to be had on a search for the treasure, secrets and collectables which are hidden in fiendish places throughout the game. * Use Play Coins and Pirate Duels via StreetPass to get extra booty!
